song.title: Seeing Is Believing
song.info:
\ // \\ // \\// |\ | // | \ | //\\ | / | // \\ |/ | / \\ | |___ -(>Explizit Presents<)- [ SEEING IS BELIEVING ] (Play with Cubic for the best result!)
[SONG NFO:] Composer: Jay Style: Melodic Trance Duration: 6:02 Samples: 29 (8-bit) Channels: 15 (Stereo) Tracker: ST3.21 (S3M) [NFO:]
Hey! Here's Jay again! Thiz time with a style what I think is also kewl beside Rave.. : Trance! Yeah! I always buy Trance Nation CD's and I think they are great! I hope thiz is a "Deep in a Dream"Beater! I Hope you like the track! Btw: The Voice "Seeing is believing" is from Ravelab Hope ya enjoy the tune! Greetings time! [GREETINGS AND RESPECT] Neophite Ch:ilm Madmax Thunderbass Morphine Landslide Batjo Komah Armadon Heretic Sonic Blowbrain Phoncie! Kaotix Maverick Dynamix The peric Keith3o3 Dac Spleen Rave-r Starfox Infra Spike Sturm The Undertaker Dirtbag Radical Lightwing Modem Paranoid-man Mailman Dr nuke & beasty bass X-it Darkwin Wildcard Sander Iceman Thunderstrk You!
Everbody at the Scene! [ THNX TO: ]
Heretic:for the breakbeat Sturm:for some Acidsounds
[ SPECIAL HI TO: ] Armadon! welcome to the winning team! now you're a Musicmaker! yeah!
[ READY TO FLOW ] Haven't got my Sl1210 Compo II release"Ready to flow"? then leech it at Sl1210! It's worth yar credz! Don't forget to Vote!
[ WANNA CONTACT JAY? ]
That's Possible! (ohyeah?) Just leave a maily at Sl1210! Reactions are welcome! [c] Jay / Explizit 1996 July Ochten, The Netherlands [Gelderland]
